issues.description: In fix_vec_sub.asm, the solution declares fix_vec_sub_asm as extern while the template declares it as global, causing inconsistent symbol visibility and preventing correct linking of the function stub. All other modules export their fix_*_asm symbols as global.
issues.suggested_fix: In the solution file fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the 'extern fix_vec_sub_asm' directive with 'global fix_vec_sub_asm' under the section .data so that the symbol is exported consistently with the template and other modules.
